message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly sought after by many. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement. Considering its worth and your potential interest, I propose a price of $120 for the product.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in your product but I can't go higher than $80. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of our product and your interest, I would like to offer it to you for $95. I hope this proposal works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $95 is still a little outside my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $85. This is my final offer.
